record.title: QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I rise to a question of the privileges of the House and offer the resolution I noticed on May 21, 2007.

record.chair: The Clerk will report the resolution.
The resolution presents a question of privilege.

speaking.topic: MOTION TO TABLE OFFERED BY MR.
speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I demand a recorded vote.

record.chair: Members are advised there are 2 minutes remaining on the vote.
